data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, masagi ɠa ɠoozunɛɛzu è-zɛbɛi zu.
È ʋaani bɛ ga tuya ʋagɔiti.
É zɛnvui valini è ma, è feeni zea,
Ná-lɛbiyai wɔɔlɔa, tɔɔzei ɗa-zobogi ʋɔ, nii è feeni zea,
È kɛɛʋɛ ga tuya ɗɛungi eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Masagi ɠa ɓɔɠɔ ɠalivaazu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma,
Ɗa yeeʋɛɛ è zili nuiti kpein ma,
Ɗa ti ɠɛ ga abuzulugi, siɛgi zu è ɠulazu la kɛlɛma.
Ɗa ti-mavofodai undaaʋili, é ɠula eteai zu,
Ta faa ɲɔi ɓɛtɛzu è laalɔɠɔma,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɗa ti ɓɛ, ti ʋoluazo,
